title: Can we take 15 AP off of Rylai's, give it 100/150 HP, buff the slow, and nerf Cass' E again?
body:
#Rylai's, currently, is only being abused on bot lane 'supports' as a moderately high AP item with a very modest cost. That's about it. 

How about we push it back towards a real niche: Champions who lack CC who don't mind giving up a little AP for the ability to actually function in a game. 

A significant buff for single target slows would be in order, and a very minor buff for AoE. 

____________

Nerf Cass' E because it USED to count as AoE/DoT for the purposes of spellvamp and Rylai's, and during her shit-tier rework, they removed that in an attempt to make the rework less trash. Now that she isn't trash, it should be there again. It was there for a reason since season 1 or 2. Put it back.

######Edit: For clarity, Cass' E would function the same as now with the buffed Rylai's, but other champions who need a larger slow/duration to function decently would get more mileage out of it.

I guess I just look over the fence at the AD Items and see a wide variety of builds, even on Marksmen. Meanwhile on the AP side of the world you're lucky to see 1 item difference in the builds. 

And you know why? Because pretty much every item interacts with one mage's kit the same as it'll interact with another mage's kit. 

With Marksmen you've got abilities that make them auto attack faster, or give them on hit damage, or they've got a low cooldown spell that they can use in between auto attacks, or they primarily use spells and only fall back on auto attacks. All these different play styles, each of which has a slightly different build that works better for it. 

With Mages, you do most of your champion specific decision making at level 1: do I start Tear, Catalyst, or Lost Chapter? Everything after that is dictated by what the enemy team has, not what your champion wants.
